permissions.name: content:publish
permissions.description: Publish content to make it visible to users

permissions.name: games:publish
permissions.description: Publish games to make them visible to referees

permissions.name: mentee_games:read
permissions.description: View mentee game assignments and performance

permissions.name: mentorships:manage
permissions.description: Manage mentorship relationships and mentee progress

permissions.name: mentorships:read
permissions.description: View mentorship relationships and mentee information

permissions.name: referees:manage
permissions.description: Manage referee levels, availability, and status

permissions.name: roles:assign
permissions.description: Assign or remove roles from users

permissions.name: roles:manage
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete roles and permissions

permissions.name: users:impersonate
permissions.description: Login as other users for troubleshooting

roles.name: Admin
roles.description: Administrative access to most system functions. Cannot manage roles or impersonate users.

roles.name: Assignment Manager
roles.description: Manages game assignments and referee scheduling. Can assign referees to games.

roles.name: Mentor
roles.description: Can mentor other referees, view their games, and provide guidance

roles.name: Mentorship Coordinator
roles.description: Can manage all mentorship relationships, assign mentors and mentees

roles.name: Referee Coordinator
roles.description: Coordinates referee activities, evaluations, and development. Manages referee information.

roles.name: Super Admin
roles.description: Full system access with all permissions. Can manage other admins and system settings.
